Device_tree module¶

Module which contains the classes related to the TreeView

Classes:

[summary]

Manage the creation of the treeview item selected (recursive)

  • path (str) – path to analyse

Device_tree.ReflushTree(frame, device, msg)¶

Create the branches of the treeview(recursive)

Parameters

  • frame (MainWindow) – main window

  • device (wx.TreeItemId) – item to add

  • msg (str or list or dict) – back of infos of the file or directory analysed

Device_tree.define_librairies(tree, name_of_card)¶

Define the library section that’s depends of the card connected

Parameters

  • tree (Device_tree) – TreeView

  • name_of_card (str) – Esp32, esp8266 or pyboard

Parameters

the content of the file
